AI Description: R-Bioconductor Biobase is a foundational R package in the Bioconductor project that provides a base infrastructure for representing and working with biological data in R. It contains core functionalities for representing biological data structures, such as data classes, storage and retrieval mechanisms, and additional metadata.
Core Features: Provides Core Infrastructure For Handling & Analyzing Biological Data In R, Defines Basic Data Structures & Methods For Representing Biological Data, Supports Data Storage, Retrieval, & Manipulation, Includes Functions For Accessing & Managing Additional Metadata Associated With Biological Data
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, R Package, Biological Data
